General.Name: Mitra Energi Persada Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Mitra Energi Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the energy infrastructure, and oil and gas businesses in Indonesia. It trades in and distributes natural and artificial gas through a network of downstream pipelines in South Sumatra region. The company also trades in machine and equipment, and other related supplies, as well as solid fuel, liquid and gas, and other related products. In addition, it is involved in the installation of electric power supply and electrical operations; and power plant, coal mining, and other related businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Korpora Persada Investama, Tbk and changed its name to PT Mitra Energi Persada Tbk in January 2008. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Mitra Energi Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mulya Tara Mandiri.
General.Address: Graha Krama Yudha, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12760
